Developer Terms of Use
des: Bible Smart Trivia is the best Bible quiz program in Alexa. It supports Alexa Echo Buttons up to 4 players. You can also save the sessions and continue it. More questions will be added soon. The voice service will guide you to enjoy the quiz.
